# Iron Tiger Digital

> Digital marketing agency specializing in local SEO, lead generation, and marketing funnels for home service businesses.

## About

Iron Tiger Digital helps home service contractors — plumbers, HVAC techs, landscapers, roofers, electricians, and similar trades — get found online and generate qualified leads. Founded by Costa Demetral in Austin, Texas, the agency focuses exclusively on the home service industry.

## Services

- **Lead Generation**: Custom websites built to convert visitors into phone calls and form submissions. Optimized landing pages, call tracking, and CRM integration.
- **Local SEO**: Google Business Profile optimization, local keyword targeting, citation building, and map pack ranking strategies for service-area businesses.
- **Marketing Funnels**: Multi-step lead capture systems with automated follow-up sequences, retargeting, and conversion optimization.
- **Reputation Management**: Automated review generation, monitoring across Google/Yelp/BBB, and professional response management.

## Pricing

- Website Setup: $300 one-time (custom-built website, SEO foundation, Google Business Profile setup)
- Monthly Growth Plan: $300/month (ongoing SEO, content, lead generation, reporting)
- No long-term contracts. Cancel anytime.
